73/** from cfg username, after daemonize setup performed */
74uid_t cfg_uid = (uid_t)-1;
75/** from cfg username, after daemonize setup performed */
76gid_t cfg_gid = (gid_t)-1;
77/** for debug allow small timeout values for fast rollovers */
78int autr_permit_small_holddown = 0;
79/** size (in bytes) of stream wait buffers max */
80size_t stream_wait_max = 4 * 1024 * 1024;
81
82/** global config during parsing */
83struct config_parser_state* cfg_parser = 0;
84
85/** init ports possible for use */
86static void init_outgoing_availports(int* array, int num);
87
88struct config_file*
89config_create(void)
90{
91 struct config_file* cfg;
92 cfg = (struct config_file*)calloc(1, sizeof(struct config_file));
93 if(!cfg)
94 return NULL;
95 /* the defaults if no config is present */
96 cfg->verbosity = 1;
97 cfg->stat_interval = 0;
98 cfg->stat_cumulative = 0;
99 cfg->stat_extended = 0;
100 cfg->num_threads = 1;
101 cfg->port = UNBOUND_DNS_PORT;
102 cfg->do_ip4 = 1;
103 cfg->do_ip6 = 1;
104 cfg->do_udp = 1;
105 cfg->do_tcp = 1;
106 cfg->tcp_upstream = 0;
107 cfg->udp_upstream_without_downstream = 0;
108 cfg->tcp_mss = 0;
109 cfg->outgoing_tcp_mss = 0;
110 cfg->tcp_idle_timeout = 30 * 1000; /* 30s in millisecs */
111 cfg->do_tcp_keepalive = 0;
112 cfg->tcp_keepalive_timeout = 120 * 1000; /* 120s in millisecs */
113 cfg->ssl_service_key = NULL;
114 cfg->ssl_service_pem = NULL;
115 cfg->ssl_port = UNBOUND_DNS_OVER_TLS_PORT;
116 cfg->ssl_upstream = 0;
117 cfg->tls_cert_bundle = NULL;
118 cfg->tls_win_cert = 0;
119 cfg->use_syslog = 1;
120 cfg->log_identity = NULL; /* changed later with argv[0] */
121 cfg->log_time_ascii = 0;
122 cfg->log_queries = 0;
123 cfg->log_replies = 0;
124 cfg->log_tag_queryreply = 0;
125 cfg->log_local_actions = 0;
126 cfg->log_servfail = 0;
127#ifndef USE_WINSOCK
128# ifdef USE_MINI_EVENT
129 /* select max 1024 sockets */
130 cfg->outgoing_num_ports = 960;
131 cfg->num_queries_per_thread = 512;
132# else
133 /* libevent can use many sockets */
134 cfg->outgoing_num_ports = 4096;
135 cfg->num_queries_per_thread = 1024;
136# endif
137 cfg->outgoing_num_tcp = 10;
138 cfg->incoming_num_tcp = 10;
139#else
140 cfg->outgoing_num_ports = 48; /* windows is limited in num fds */
141 cfg->num_queries_per_thread = 24;
142 cfg->outgoing_num_tcp = 2; /* leaves 64-52=12 for: 4if,1stop,thread4 */
143 cfg->incoming_num_tcp = 2;
144#endif
145 cfg->stream_wait_size = 4 * 1024 * 1024;
146 cfg->edns_buffer_size = 4096; /* 4k from rfc recommendation */
147 cfg->msg_buffer_size = 65552; /* 64 k + a small margin */
148 cfg->msg_cache_size = 4 * 1024 * 1024;
149 cfg->msg_cache_slabs = 4;
150 cfg->jostle_time = 200;
151 cfg->rrset_cache_size = 4 * 1024 * 1024;
152 cfg->rrset_cache_slabs = 4;
153 cfg->host_ttl = 900;
154 cfg->bogus_ttl = 60;
155 cfg->min_ttl = 0;
156 cfg->max_ttl = 3600 * 24;
157 cfg->max_negative_ttl = 3600;
158 cfg->prefetch = 0;
159 cfg->prefetch_key = 0;
160 cfg->deny_any = 0;
161 cfg->infra_cache_slabs = 4;
162 cfg->infra_cache_numhosts = 10000;
163 cfg->infra_cache_min_rtt = 50;
164 cfg->delay_close = 0;
165 if(!(cfg->outgoing_avail_ports = (int*)calloc(65536, sizeof(int))))
166 goto error_exit;
167 init_outgoing_availports(cfg->outgoing_avail_ports, 65536);
168 if(!(cfg->username = strdup(UB_USERNAME))) goto error_exit;
169#ifdef HAVE_CHROOT
170 if(!(cfg->chrootdir = strdup(CHROOT_DIR))) goto error_exit;
171#endif
172 if(!(cfg->directory = strdup(RUN_DIR))) goto error_exit;
173 if(!(cfg->logfile = strdup(""))) goto error_exit;
174 if(!(cfg->pidfile = strdup(PIDFILE))) goto error_exit;
175 if(!(cfg->target_fetch_policy = strdup("3 2 1 0 0"))) goto error_exit;
176 cfg->fast_server_permil = 0;
177 cfg->fast_server_num = 3;
178 cfg->donotqueryaddrs = NULL;
179 cfg->donotquery_localhost = 1;
180 cfg->root_hints = NULL;
181 cfg->use_systemd = 0;
182 cfg->do_daemonize = 1;
183 cfg->if_automatic = 0;
184 cfg->so_rcvbuf = 0;
185 cfg->so_sndbuf = 0;
186 cfg->so_reuseport = REUSEPORT_DEFAULT;
187 cfg->ip_transparent = 0;
188 cfg->ip_freebind = 0;
189 cfg->num_ifs = 0;
190 cfg->ifs = NULL;
191 cfg->num_out_ifs = 0;
192 cfg->out_ifs = NULL;
193 cfg->stubs = NULL;
194 cfg->forwards = NULL;
195 cfg->auths = NULL;
196#ifdef CLIENT_SUBNET
197 cfg->client_subnet = NULL;
198 cfg->client_subnet_zone = NULL;
199 cfg->client_subnet_opcode = LDNS_EDNS_CLIENT_SUBNET;
200 cfg->client_subnet_always_forward = 0;
201 cfg->max_client_subnet_ipv4 = 24;
202 cfg->max_client_subnet_ipv6 = 56;
203 cfg->min_client_subnet_ipv4 = 0;
204 cfg->min_client_subnet_ipv6 = 0;
205 cfg->max_ecs_tree_size_ipv4 = 100;
206 cfg->max_ecs_tree_size_ipv6 = 100;
207#endif
208 cfg->views = NULL;
209 cfg->acls = NULL;
210 cfg->tcp_connection_limits = NULL;
211 cfg->harden_short_bufsize = 0;
212 cfg->harden_large_queries = 0;
213 cfg->harden_glue = 1;
214 cfg->harden_dnssec_stripped = 1;
215 cfg->harden_below_nxdomain = 1;
216 cfg->harden_referral_path = 0;
217 cfg->harden_algo_downgrade = 0;
218 cfg->use_caps_bits_for_id = 0;
219 cfg->caps_whitelist = NULL;
220 cfg->private_address = NULL;
221 cfg->private_domain = NULL;
222 cfg->unwanted_threshold = 0;
223 cfg->hide_identity = 0;
224 cfg->hide_version = 0;
225 cfg->hide_trustanchor = 0;
226 cfg->identity = NULL;
227 cfg->version = NULL;
228 cfg->auto_trust_anchor_file_list = NULL;
229 cfg->trust_anchor_file_list = NULL;
230 cfg->trust_anchor_list = NULL;
231 cfg->trusted_keys_file_list = NULL;
232 cfg->trust_anchor_signaling = 1;
233 cfg->root_key_sentinel = 1;
234 cfg->dlv_anchor_file = NULL;
235 cfg->dlv_anchor_list = NULL;
236 cfg->domain_insecure = NULL;
237 cfg->val_date_override = 0;
238 cfg->val_sig_skew_min = 3600; /* at least daylight savings trouble */
239 cfg->val_sig_skew_max = 86400; /* at most timezone settings trouble */
240 cfg->val_clean_additional = 1;
241 cfg->val_log_level = 0;
242 cfg->val_log_squelch = 0;
243 cfg->val_permissive_mode = 0;
244 cfg->aggressive_nsec = 0;
245 cfg->ignore_cd = 0;
246 cfg->serve_expired = 0;
247 cfg->serve_expired_ttl = 0;
248 cfg->serve_expired_ttl_reset = 0;
249 cfg->add_holddown = 30*24*3600;
250 cfg->del_holddown = 30*24*3600;
251 cfg->keep_missing = 366*24*3600; /* one year plus a little leeway */
252 cfg->permit_small_holddown = 0;
253 cfg->key_cache_size = 4 * 1024 * 1024;
254 cfg->key_cache_slabs = 4;
255 cfg->neg_cache_size = 1 * 1024 * 1024;
256 cfg->local_zones = NULL;
257 cfg->local_zones_nodefault = NULL;
258 cfg->local_zones_disable_default = 0;
259 cfg->local_data = NULL;
260 cfg->local_zone_overrides = NULL;
261 cfg->unblock_lan_zones = 0;
262 cfg->insecure_lan_zones = 0;
263 cfg->python_script = NULL;
264 cfg->remote_control_enable = 0;
265 cfg->control_ifs.first = NULL;
266 cfg->control_ifs.last = NULL;
267 cfg->control_port = UNBOUND_CONTROL_PORT;
268 cfg->control_use_cert = 1;
269 cfg->minimal_responses = 1;
270 cfg->rrset_roundrobin = 0;
271 cfg->unknown_server_time_limit = 376;
272 cfg->max_udp_size = 4096;
273 if(!(cfg->server_key_file = strdup(RUN_DIR"/unbound_server.key")))
274 goto error_exit;
275 if(!(cfg->server_cert_file = strdup(RUN_DIR"/unbound_server.pem")))
276 goto error_exit;
277 if(!(cfg->control_key_file = strdup(RUN_DIR"/unbound_control.key")))
278 goto error_exit;
279 if(!(cfg->control_cert_file = strdup(RUN_DIR"/unbound_control.pem")))
280 goto error_exit;
281
282#ifdef CLIENT_SUBNET
283 if(!(cfg->module_conf = strdup("subnetcache validator iterator"))) goto error_exit;
284#else
285 if(!(cfg->module_conf = strdup("validator iterator"))) goto error_exit;
286#endif
287 if(!(cfg->val_nsec3_key_iterations =
288 strdup("1024 150 2048 500 4096 2500"))) goto error_exit;
289#if defined(DNSTAP_SOCKET_PATH)
290 if(!(cfg->dnstap_socket_path = strdup(DNSTAP_SOCKET_PATH)))
291 goto error_exit;
292#endif
293 cfg->disable_dnssec_lame_check = 0;
294 cfg->ip_ratelimit = 0;
295 cfg->ratelimit = 0;
296 cfg->ip_ratelimit_slabs = 4;
297 cfg->ratelimit_slabs = 4;
298 cfg->ip_ratelimit_size = 4*1024*1024;
299 cfg->ratelimit_size = 4*1024*1024;
300 cfg->ratelimit_for_domain = NULL;
301 cfg->ratelimit_below_domain = NULL;
302 cfg->ip_ratelimit_factor = 10;
303 cfg->ratelimit_factor = 10;
304 cfg->qname_minimisation = 1;
305 cfg->qname_minimisation_strict = 0;
306 cfg->shm_enable = 0;
307 cfg->shm_key = 11777;
308 cfg->dnscrypt = 0;
309 cfg->dnscrypt_port = 0;
310 cfg->dnscrypt_provider = NULL;
311 cfg->dnscrypt_provider_cert = NULL;
312 cfg->dnscrypt_provider_cert_rotated = NULL;
313 cfg->dnscrypt_secret_key = NULL;
314 cfg->dnscrypt_shared_secret_cache_size = 4*1024*1024;
315 cfg->dnscrypt_shared_secret_cache_slabs = 4;
316 cfg->dnscrypt_nonce_cache_size = 4*1024*1024;
317 cfg->dnscrypt_nonce_cache_slabs = 4;
318#ifdef USE_IPSECMOD
319 cfg->ipsecmod_enabled = 1;
320 cfg->ipsecmod_ignore_bogus = 0;
321 cfg->ipsecmod_hook = NULL;
322 cfg->ipsecmod_max_ttl = 3600;
323 cfg->ipsecmod_whitelist = NULL;
324 cfg->ipsecmod_strict = 0;
325#endif
326#ifdef USE_CACHEDB
327 cfg->cachedb_backend = NULL;
328 cfg->cachedb_secret = NULL;
329#endif
330 return cfg;
331error_exit:
332 config_delete(cfg);
333 return NULL;
334}
335
336struct config_file* config_create_forlib(void)
337{
338 struct config_file* cfg = config_create();
339 if(!cfg) return NULL;
340 /* modifications for library use, less verbose, less memory */
341 free(cfg->chrootdir);
342 cfg->chrootdir = NULL;
343 cfg->verbosity = 0;
344 cfg->outgoing_num_ports = 16; /* in library use, this is 'reasonable'
345 and probably within the ulimit(maxfds) of the user */
346 cfg->outgoing_num_tcp = 2;
347 cfg->msg_cache_size = 1024*1024;
348 cfg->msg_cache_slabs = 1;
349 cfg->rrset_cache_size = 1024*1024;
350 cfg->rrset_cache_slabs = 1;
351 cfg->infra_cache_slabs = 1;
352 cfg->use_syslog = 0;
353 cfg->key_cache_size = 1024*1024;
354 cfg->key_cache_slabs = 1;
355 cfg->neg_cache_size = 100 * 1024;
356 cfg->donotquery_localhost = 0; /* allow, so that you can ask a
357 forward nameserver running on localhost */
358 cfg->val_log_level = 2; /* to fill why_bogus with */
359 cfg->val_log_squelch = 1;
360 cfg->minimal_responses = 0;
361 return cfg;
362}
363
364/** check that the value passed is >= 0 */
365#define IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO \
366 if(atoi(val) == 0 && strcmp(val, "0") != 0) return 0
367/** check that the value passed is > 0 */
368#define IS_NONZERO_NUMBER \
369 if(atoi(val) == 0) return 0
370/** check that the value passed is not 0 and a power of 2 */
371#define IS_POW2_NUMBER \
372 if(atoi(val) == 0 || !is_pow2((size_t)atoi(val))) return 0
373/** check that the value passed is yes or no */
374#define IS_YES_OR_NO \
375 if(strcmp(val, "yes") != 0 && strcmp(val, "no") != 0) return 0
376/** put integer_or_zero into variable */
377#define S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str) == 0) \
378 { IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->var = atoi(val); }
379/** put integer_nonzero into variable */
380#define S_NUMBER_NONZERO(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str) == 0) \
381 { IS_NONZERO_NUMBER; cfg->var = atoi(val); }
382/** put integer_or_zero into unsigned */
383#define S_UNSIGNED_OR_ZERO(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str) == 0) \
384 { IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->var = (unsigned)atoi(val); }
385/** put integer_or_zero into size_t */
386#define S_SIZET_OR_ZERO(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str) == 0) \
387 { IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->var = (size_t)atoi(val); }
388/** put integer_nonzero into size_t */
389#define S_SIZET_NONZERO(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str) == 0) \
390 { IS_NONZERO_NUMBER; cfg->var = (size_t)atoi(val); }
391/** put yesno into variable */
392#define S_YNO(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str) == 0) \
393 { IS_YES_OR_NO; cfg->var = (strcmp(val, "yes") == 0); }
394/** put memsize into variable */
395#define S_MEMSIZE(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
396 { return cfg_parse_memsize(val, &cfg->var); }
397/** put pow2 number into variable */
398#define S_POW2(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
399 { IS_POW2_NUMBER; cfg->var = (size_t)atoi(val); }
400/** put string into variable */
401#define S_STR(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
402 { free(cfg->var); return (cfg->var = strdup(val)) != NULL; }
403/** put string into strlist */
404#define S_STRLIST(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
405 { return cfg_strlist_insert(&cfg->var, strdup(val)); }
406/** put string into strlist if not present yet*/
407#define S_STRLIST_UNIQ(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
408 { if(cfg_strlist_find(cfg->var, val)) { return 0;} \
409 return cfg_strlist_insert(&cfg->var, strdup(val)); }
410/** append string to strlist */
411#define S_STRLIST_APPEND(str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
412 { return cfg_strlist_append(&cfg->var, strdup(val)); }
413
414int config_set_option(struct config_file* cfg, const char* opt,
415 const char* val)
416{
417 char buf[64];
418 if(!opt) return 0;
419 if(opt[strlen(opt)-1] != ':' && strlen(opt)+2<sizeof(buf)) {
420 snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "%s:", opt);
421 opt = buf;
422 }
423 S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO("verbosity:", verbosity)
424 else if(strcmp(opt, "statistics-interval:") == 0) {
425 if(strcmp(val, "0") == 0 || strcmp(val, "") == 0)
426 cfg->stat_interval = 0;
427 else if(atoi(val) == 0)
428 return 0;
429 else cfg->stat_interval = atoi(val);
430 } else if(strcmp(opt, "num_threads:") == 0) {
431 /* not supported, library must have 1 thread in bgworker */
432 return 0;
433 } else if(strcmp(opt, "outgoing-port-permit:") == 0) {
434 return cfg_mark_ports(val, 1,
435 cfg->outgoing_avail_ports, 65536);
436 } else if(strcmp(opt, "outgoing-port-avoid:") == 0) {
437 return cfg_mark_ports(val, 0,
438 cfg->outgoing_avail_ports, 65536);
439 } else if(strcmp(opt, "local-zone:") == 0) {
440 return cfg_parse_local_zone(cfg, val);
441 } else if(strcmp(opt, "val-override-date:") == 0) {
442 if(strcmp(val, "") == 0 || strcmp(val, "0") == 0) {
443 cfg->val_date_override = 0;
444 } else if(strlen(val) == 14) {
445 cfg->val_date_override = cfg_convert_timeval(val);
446 return cfg->val_date_override != 0;
447 } else {
448 if(atoi(val) == 0) return 0;
449 cfg->val_date_override = (uint32_t)atoi(val);
450 }
451 } else if(strcmp(opt, "local-data-ptr:") == 0) {
452 char* ptr = cfg_ptr_reverse((char*)opt);
453 return cfg_strlist_insert(&cfg->local_data, ptr);
454 } else if(strcmp(opt, "logfile:") == 0) {
455 cfg->use_syslog = 0;
456 free(cfg->logfile);
457 return (cfg->logfile = strdup(val)) != NULL;
458 }
459 else if(strcmp(opt, "log-time-ascii:") == 0)
460 { IS_YES_OR_NO; cfg->log_time_ascii = (strcmp(val, "yes") == 0);
461 log_set_time_asc(cfg->log_time_ascii); }
462 else S_SIZET_NONZERO("max-udp-size:", max_udp_size)
463 else S_YNO("use-syslog:", use_syslog)
464 else S_STR("log-identity:", log_identity)
465 else S_YNO("extended-statistics:", stat_extended)
466 else S_YNO("statistics-cumulative:", stat_cumulative)
467 else S_YNO("shm-enable:", shm_enable)
468 else S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO("shm-key:", shm_key)
469 else S_YNO("do-ip4:", do_ip4)
470 else S_YNO("do-ip6:", do_ip6)
471 else S_YNO("do-udp:", do_udp)
472 else S_YNO("do-tcp:", do_tcp)
473 else S_YNO("tcp-upstream:", tcp_upstream)
474 else S_YNO("udp-upstream-without-downstream:",
475 udp_upstream_without_downstream)
476 else S_NUMBER_NONZERO("tcp-mss:", tcp_mss)
477 else S_NUMBER_NONZERO("outgoing-tcp-mss:", outgoing_tcp_mss)
478 else S_NUMBER_NONZERO("tcp-idle-timeout:", tcp_idle_timeout)
479 else S_YNO("edns-tcp-keepalive:", do_tcp_keepalive)
480 else S_NUMBER_NONZERO("edns-tcp-keepalive-timeout:", tcp_keepalive_timeout)
481 else S_YNO("ssl-upstream:", ssl_upstream)
482 else S_STR("ssl-service-key:", ssl_service_key)
483 else S_STR("ssl-service-pem:", ssl_service_pem)
484 else S_NUMBER_NONZERO("ssl-port:", ssl_port)
485 else S_STR("tls-cert-bundle:", tls_cert_bundle)
486 else S_YNO("tls-win-cert:", tls_win_cert)
487 else S_STRLIST("additional-tls-port:", tls_additional_port)
488 else S_STRLIST("tls-additional-ports:", tls_additional_port)
489 else S_STRLIST("tls-additional-port:", tls_additional_port)
490 else S_STRLIST_APPEND("tls-session-ticket-keys:", tls_session_ticket_keys)
491 else S_STR("tls-ciphers:", tls_ciphers)
492 else S_STR("tls-ciphersuites:", tls_ciphersuites)
493 else S_YNO("interface-automatic:", if_automatic)
494 else S_YNO("use-systemd:", use_systemd)
495 else S_YNO("do-daemonize:", do_daemonize)
496 else S_NUMBER_NONZERO("port:", port)
497 else S_NUMBER_NONZERO("outgoing-range:", outgoing_num_ports)
498 else S_SIZET_OR_ZERO("outgoing-num-tcp:", outgoing_num_tcp)
499 else S_SIZET_OR_ZERO("incoming-num-tcp:", incoming_num_tcp)
500 else S_MEMSIZE("stream-wait-size:", stream_wait_size)
501 else S_SIZET_NONZERO("edns-buffer-size:", edns_buffer_size)
502 else S_SIZET_NONZERO("msg-buffer-size:", msg_buffer_size)
503 else S_MEMSIZE("msg-cache-size:", msg_cache_size)
504 else S_POW2("msg-cache-slabs:", msg_cache_slabs)
505 else S_SIZET_NONZERO("num-queries-per-thread:",num_queries_per_thread)
506 else S_SIZET_OR_ZERO("jostle-timeout:", jostle_time)
507 else S_MEMSIZE("so-rcvbuf:", so_rcvbuf)
508 else S_MEMSIZE("so-sndbuf:", so_sndbuf)
509 else S_YNO("so-reuseport:", so_reuseport)
510 else S_YNO("ip-transparent:", ip_transparent)
511 else S_YNO("ip-freebind:", ip_freebind)
512 else S_MEMSIZE("rrset-cache-size:", rrset_cache_size)
513 else S_POW2("rrset-cache-slabs:", rrset_cache_slabs)
514 else S_YNO("prefetch:", prefetch)
515 else S_YNO("prefetch-key:", prefetch_key)
516 else S_YNO("deny-any:", deny_any)
517 else if(strcmp(opt, "cache-max-ttl:") == 0)
518 { IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->max_ttl = atoi(val); MAX_TTL=(time_t)cfg->max_ttl;}
519 else if(strcmp(opt, "cache-max-negative-ttl:") == 0)
520 { IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->max_negative_ttl = atoi(val); MAX_NEG_TTL=(time_t)cfg->max_negative_ttl;}
521 else if(strcmp(opt, "cache-min-ttl:") == 0)
522 { IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->min_ttl = atoi(val); MIN_TTL=(time_t)cfg->min_ttl;}
523 else if(strcmp(opt, "infra-cache-min-rtt:") == 0) {
524 IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->infra_cache_min_rtt = atoi(val);
525 RTT_MIN_TIMEOUT=cfg->infra_cache_min_rtt;
526 }
527 else S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO("infra-host-ttl:", host_ttl)
528 else S_POW2("infra-cache-slabs:", infra_cache_slabs)
529 else S_SIZET_NONZERO("infra-cache-numhosts:", infra_cache_numhosts)
530 else S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO("delay-close:", delay_close)
531 else S_STR("chroot:", chrootdir)
532 else S_STR("username:", username)
533 else S_STR("directory:", directory)
534 else S_STR("pidfile:", pidfile)
535 else S_YNO("hide-identity:", hide_identity)
536 else S_YNO("hide-version:", hide_version)
537 else S_YNO("hide-trustanchor:", hide_trustanchor)
538 else S_STR("identity:", identity)
539 else S_STR("version:", version)
540 else S_STRLIST("root-hints:", root_hints)
541 else S_STR("target-fetch-policy:", target_fetch_policy)
542 else S_YNO("harden-glue:", harden_glue)
543 else S_YNO("harden-short-bufsize:", harden_short_bufsize)
544 else S_YNO("harden-large-queries:", harden_large_queries)
545 else S_YNO("harden-dnssec-stripped:", harden_dnssec_stripped)
546 else S_YNO("harden-below-nxdomain:", harden_below_nxdomain)
547 else S_YNO("harden-referral-path:", harden_referral_path)
548 else S_YNO("harden-algo-downgrade:", harden_algo_downgrade)
549 else S_YNO("use-caps-for-id:", use_caps_bits_for_id)
550 else S_STRLIST("caps-whitelist:", caps_whitelist)
551 else S_SIZET_OR_ZERO("unwanted-reply-threshold:", unwanted_threshold)
552 else S_STRLIST("private-address:", private_address)
553 else S_STRLIST("private-domain:", private_domain)
554 else S_YNO("do-not-query-localhost:", donotquery_localhost)
555 else S_STRLIST("do-not-query-address:", donotqueryaddrs)
556 else S_STRLIST("auto-trust-anchor-file:", auto_trust_anchor_file_list)
557 else S_STRLIST("trust-anchor-file:", trust_anchor_file_list)
558 else S_STRLIST("trust-anchor:", trust_anchor_list)
559 else S_STRLIST("trusted-keys-file:", trusted_keys_file_list)
560 else S_YNO("trust-anchor-signaling:", trust_anchor_signaling)
561 else S_YNO("root-key-sentinel:", root_key_sentinel)
562 else S_STR("dlv-anchor-file:", dlv_anchor_file)
563 else S_STRLIST("dlv-anchor:", dlv_anchor_list)
564 else S_STRLIST("domain-insecure:", domain_insecure)
565 else S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO("val-bogus-ttl:", bogus_ttl)
566 else S_YNO("val-clean-additional:", val_clean_additional)
567 else S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO("val-log-level:", val_log_level)
568 else S_YNO("val-log-squelch:", val_log_squelch)
569 else S_YNO("log-queries:", log_queries)
570 else S_YNO("log-replies:", log_replies)
571 else S_YNO("log-tag-queryreply:", log_tag_queryreply)
572 else S_YNO("log-local-actions:", log_local_actions)
573 else S_YNO("log-servfail:", log_servfail)
574 else S_YNO("val-permissive-mode:", val_permissive_mode)
575 else S_YNO("aggressive-nsec:", aggressive_nsec)
576 else S_YNO("ignore-cd-flag:", ignore_cd)
577 else S_YNO("serve-expired:", serve_expired)
578 else if(strcmp(opt, "serve_expired_ttl:") == 0)
579 { IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->serve_expired_ttl = atoi(val); SERVE_EXPIRED_TTL=(time_t)cfg->serve_expired_ttl;}
580 else S_YNO("serve-expired-ttl-reset:", serve_expired_ttl_reset)
581 else S_STR("val-nsec3-keysize-iterations:", val_nsec3_key_iterations)
582 else S_UNSIGNED_OR_ZERO("add-holddown:", add_holddown)
583 else S_UNSIGNED_OR_ZERO("del-holddown:", del_holddown)
584 else S_UNSIGNED_OR_ZERO("keep-missing:", keep_missing)
585 else if(strcmp(opt, "permit-small-holddown:") == 0)
586 { IS_YES_OR_NO; cfg->permit_small_holddown = (strcmp(val, "yes") == 0);
587 autr_permit_small_holddown = cfg->permit_small_holddown; }
588 else S_MEMSIZE("key-cache-size:", key_cache_size)
589 else S_POW2("key-cache-slabs:", key_cache_slabs)
590 else S_MEMSIZE("neg-cache-size:", neg_cache_size)
591 else S_YNO("minimal-responses:", minimal_responses)
592 else S_YNO("rrset-roundrobin:", rrset_roundrobin)
593 else S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO("unknown-server-time-limit:", unknown_server_time_limit)
594 else S_STRLIST("local-data:", local_data)
595 else S_YNO("unblock-lan-zones:", unblock_lan_zones)
596 else S_YNO("insecure-lan-zones:", insecure_lan_zones)
597 else S_YNO("control-enable:", remote_control_enable)
598 else S_STRLIST_APPEND("control-interface:", control_ifs)
599 else S_NUMBER_NONZERO("control-port:", control_port)
600 else S_STR("server-key-file:", server_key_file)
601 else S_STR("server-cert-file:", server_cert_file)
602 else S_STR("control-key-file:", control_key_file)
603 else S_STR("control-cert-file:", control_cert_file)
604 else S_STR("module-config:", module_conf)
605 else S_STR("python-script:", python_script)
606 else S_YNO("disable-dnssec-lame-check:", disable_dnssec_lame_check)
607#ifdef CLIENT_SUBNET
608 /* Can't set max subnet prefix here, since that value is used when
609 * generating the address tree. */
610 /* No client-subnet-always-forward here, module registration depends on
611 * this option. */
612#endif
613#ifdef USE_DNSTAP
614 else S_YNO("dnstap-enable:", dnstap)
615 else S_STR("dnstap-socket-path:", dnstap_socket_path)
616 else S_YNO("dnstap-send-identity:", dnstap_send_identity)
617 else S_YNO("dnstap-send-version:", dnstap_send_version)
618 else S_STR("dnstap-identity:", dnstap_identity)
619 else S_STR("dnstap-version:", dnstap_version)
620 else S_YNO("dnstap-log-resolver-query-messages:",
621 dnstap_log_resolver_query_messages)
622 else S_YNO("dnstap-log-resolver-response-messages:",
623 dnstap_log_resolver_response_messages)
624 else S_YNO("dnstap-log-client-query-messages:",
625 dnstap_log_client_query_messages)
626 else S_YNO("dnstap-log-client-response-messages:",
627 dnstap_log_client_response_messages)
628 else S_YNO("dnstap-log-forwarder-query-messages:",
629 dnstap_log_forwarder_query_messages)
630 else S_YNO("dnstap-log-forwarder-response-messages:",
631 dnstap_log_forwarder_response_messages)
632#endif
633#ifdef USE_DNSCRYPT
634 else S_YNO("dnscrypt-enable:", dnscrypt)
635 else S_NUMBER_NONZERO("dnscrypt-port:", dnscrypt_port)
636 else S_STR("dnscrypt-provider:", dnscrypt_provider)
637 else S_STRLIST_UNIQ("dnscrypt-provider-cert:", dnscrypt_provider_cert)
638 else S_STRLIST("dnscrypt-provider-cert-rotated:", dnscrypt_provider_cert_rotated)
639 else S_STRLIST_UNIQ("dnscrypt-secret-key:", dnscrypt_secret_key)
640 else S_MEMSIZE("dnscrypt-shared-secret-cache-size:",
641 dnscrypt_shared_secret_cache_size)
642 else S_POW2("dnscrypt-shared-secret-cache-slabs:",
643 dnscrypt_shared_secret_cache_slabs)
644 else S_MEMSIZE("dnscrypt-nonce-cache-size:",
645 dnscrypt_nonce_cache_size)
646 else S_POW2("dnscrypt-nonce-cache-slabs:",
647 dnscrypt_nonce_cache_slabs)
648#endif
649 else if(strcmp(opt, "ip-ratelimit:") == 0) {
650 IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->ip_ratelimit = atoi(val);
651 infra_ip_ratelimit=cfg->ip_ratelimit;
652 }
653 else if(strcmp(opt, "ratelimit:") == 0) {
654 IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->ratelimit = atoi(val);
655 infra_dp_ratelimit=cfg->ratelimit;
656 }
657 else S_MEMSIZE("ip-ratelimit-size:", ip_ratelimit_size)
658 else S_MEMSIZE("ratelimit-size:", ratelimit_size)
659 else S_POW2("ip-ratelimit-slabs:", ip_ratelimit_slabs)
660 else S_POW2("ratelimit-slabs:", ratelimit_slabs)
661 else S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO("ip-ratelimit-factor:", ip_ratelimit_factor)
662 else S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO("ratelimit-factor:", ratelimit_factor)
663 else S_SIZET_NONZERO("fast-server-num:", fast_server_num)
664 else S_NUMBER_OR_ZERO("fast-server-permil:", fast_server_permil)
665 else S_YNO("qname-minimisation:", qname_minimisation)
666 else S_YNO("qname-minimisation-strict:", qname_minimisation_strict)
667#ifdef USE_IPSECMOD
668 else S_YNO("ipsecmod-enabled:", ipsecmod_enabled)
669 else S_YNO("ipsecmod-ignore-bogus:", ipsecmod_ignore_bogus)
670 else if(strcmp(opt, "ipsecmod-max-ttl:") == 0)
671 { IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->ipsecmod_max_ttl = atoi(val); }
672 else S_YNO("ipsecmod-strict:", ipsecmod_strict)
673#endif
674 else if(strcmp(opt, "define-tag:") ==0) {
675 return config_add_tag(cfg, val);
676 /* val_sig_skew_min and max are copied into val_env during init,
677 * so this does not update val_env with set_option */
678 } else if(strcmp(opt, "val-sig-skew-min:") == 0)
679 { IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->val_sig_skew_min = (int32_t)atoi(val); }
680 else if(strcmp(opt, "val-sig-skew-max:") == 0)
681 { IS_NUMBER_OR_ZERO; cfg->val_sig_skew_max = (int32_t)atoi(val); }
682 else if (strcmp(opt, "outgoing-interface:") == 0) {
683 char* d = strdup(val);
684 char** oi =
685 (char**)reallocarray(NULL, (size_t)cfg->num_out_ifs+1, sizeof(char*));
686 if(!d || !oi) { free(d); free(oi); return -1; }
687 if(cfg->out_ifs && cfg->num_out_ifs) {
688 memmove(oi, cfg->out_ifs, cfg->num_out_ifs*sizeof(char*));
689 free(cfg->out_ifs);
690 }
691 oi[cfg->num_out_ifs++] = d;
692 cfg->out_ifs = oi;
693 } else {
694 /* unknown or unsupported (from the set_option interface):
695 * interface, outgoing-interface, access-control,
696 * stub-zone, name, stub-addr, stub-host, stub-prime
697 * forward-first, stub-first, forward-ssl-upstream,
698 * stub-ssl-upstream, forward-zone, auth-zone
699 * name, forward-addr, forward-host,
700 * ratelimit-for-domain, ratelimit-below-domain,
701 * local-zone-tag, access-control-view,
702 * send-client-subnet, client-subnet-always-forward,
703 * max-client-subnet-ipv4, max-client-subnet-ipv6,
704 * min-client-subnet-ipv4, min-client-subnet-ipv6,
705 * max-ecs-tree-size-ipv4, max-ecs-tree-size-ipv6, ipsecmod_hook,
706 * ipsecmod_whitelist. */
707 return 0;
708 }
709 return 1;
710}
711
712void config_print_func(char* line, void* arg)
713{
714 FILE* f = (FILE*)arg;
715 (void)fprintf(f, "%s\n", line);
716}
717
718/** collate func arg */
719struct config_collate_arg {
720 /** list of result items */
721 struct config_strlist_head list;
722 /** if a malloc error occurred, 0 is OK */
723 int status;
724};
725
726void config_collate_func(char* line, void* arg)
727{
728 struct config_collate_arg* m = (struct config_collate_arg*)arg;
729 if(m->status)
730 return;
731 if(!cfg_strlist_append(&m->list, strdup(line)))
732 m->status = 1;
733}
734
735int config_get_option_list(struct config_file* cfg, const char* opt,
736 struct config_strlist** list)
737{
738 struct config_collate_arg m;
739 memset(&m, 0, sizeof(m));
740 *list = NULL;
741 if(!config_get_option(cfg, opt, config_collate_func, &m))
742 return 1;
743 if(m.status) {
744 config_delstrlist(m.list.first);
745 return 2;
746 }
747 *list = m.list.first;
748 return 0;
749}
750
751int
752config_get_option_collate(struct config_file* cfg, const char* opt, char** str)
753{
754 struct config_strlist* list = NULL;
755 int r;
756 *str = NULL;
757 if((r = config_get_option_list(cfg, opt, &list)) != 0)
758 return r;
759 *str = config_collate_cat(list);
760 config_delstrlist(list);
761 if(!*str) return 2;
762 return 0;
763}
764
765char*
766config_collate_cat(struct config_strlist* list)
767{
768 size_t total = 0, left;
769 struct config_strlist* s;
770 char *r, *w;
771 if(!list) /* no elements */
772 return strdup("");
773 if(list->next == NULL) /* one element , no newline at end. */
774 return strdup(list->str);
775 /* count total length */
776 for(s=list; s; s=s->next)
777 total += strlen(s->str) + 1; /* len + newline */
778 left = total+1; /* one extra for nul at end */
779 r = malloc(left);
780 if(!r)
781 return NULL;
782 w = r;
783 for(s=list; s; s=s->next) {
784 size_t this = strlen(s->str);
785 if(this+2 > left) { /* sanity check */
786 free(r);
787 return NULL;
788 }
789 snprintf(w, left, "%s\n", s->str);
790 this = strlen(w);
791 w += this;
792 left -= this;
793 }
794 return r;
795}
796
797/** compare and print decimal option */
798#define O_DEC(opt, str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
799 {snprintf(buf, len, "%d", (int)cfg->var); \
800 func(buf, arg);}
801/** compare and print unsigned option */
802#define O_UNS(opt, str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
803 {snprintf(buf, len, "%u", (unsigned)cfg->var); \
804 func(buf, arg);}
805/** compare and print yesno option */
806#define O_YNO(opt, str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
807 {func(cfg->var?"yes":"no", arg);}
808/** compare and print string option */
809#define O_STR(opt, str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
810 {func(cfg->var?cfg->var:"", arg);}
811/** compare and print array option */
812#define O_IFC(opt, str, num, arr) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) \
813 {int i; for(i=0; i<cfg->num; i++) func(cfg->arr[i], arg);}
814/** compare and print memorysize option */
815#define O_MEM(opt, str, var) if(strcmp(opt, str)==0) { \
816 if(cfg->var > 1024*1024*1024) { \
817 size_t f=cfg->var/(size_t)1000000, b=cfg->var%(size_t)1000000; \
818 snprintf(buf, len, "%u%6.6u", (unsigned)f, (unsigned)b); \
819 } else snprintf(buf, len, "%u", (unsigned)cfg->var); \
820 func(buf, arg);}
821/** compare and print list option */
822#define O_LST(opt, name, lst) if(strcmp(opt, name)==0) { \
823 struct config_strlist* p = cfg->lst; \
824 for(p = cfg->lst; p; p = p->next) \
825 func(p->str, arg); \
826 }
827/** compare and print list option */
828#define O_LS2(opt, name, lst) if(strcmp(opt, name)==0) { \
829 struct config_str2list* p = cfg->lst; \
830 for(p = cfg->lst; p; p = p->next) { \
831 snprintf(buf, len, "%s %s", p->str, p->str2); \
832 func(buf, arg); \
833 } \
834 }
835/** compare and print list option */
836#define O_LS3(opt, name, lst) if(strcmp(opt, name)==0) { \
837 struct config_str3list* p = cfg->lst; \
838 for(p = cfg->lst; p; p = p->next) { \
839 snprintf(buf, len, "%s %s %s", p->str, p->str2, p->str3); \
840 func(buf, arg); \
841 } \
842 }
843/** compare and print taglist option */
844#define O_LTG(opt, name, lst) if(strcmp(opt, name)==0) { \
845 char* tmpstr = NULL; \
846 struct config_strbytelist *p = cfg->lst; \
847 for(p = cfg->lst; p; p = p->next) {\
848 tmpstr = config_taglist2str(cfg, p->str2, p->str2len); \
849 if(tmpstr) {\
850 snprintf(buf, len, "%s %s", p->str, tmpstr); \
851 func(buf, arg); \
852 free(tmpstr); \
853 } \
854 } \
855 }
856
857int
858config_get_option(struct config_file* cfg, const char* opt,
859 void (*func)(char*,void*), void* arg)
860{
861 char buf[1024], nopt[64];
862 size_t len = sizeof(buf);
863 if(!opt) return 0;
864 if(opt && opt[strlen(opt)-1] == ':' && strlen(opt)<sizeof(nopt)) {
865 memmove(nopt, opt, strlen(opt));
866 nopt[strlen(opt)-1] = 0;
867 opt = nopt;
868 }
869 fptr_ok(fptr_whitelist_print_func(func));
870 O_DEC(opt, "verbosity", verbosity)
871 else O_DEC(opt, "statistics-interval", stat_interval)
872 else O_YNO(opt, "statistics-cumulative", stat_cumulative)
873 else O_YNO(opt, "extended-statistics", stat_extended)
874 else O_YNO(opt, "shm-enable", shm_enable)
875 else O_DEC(opt, "shm-key", shm_key)
876 else O_YNO(opt, "use-syslog", use_syslog)
877 else O_STR(opt, "log-identity", log_identity)
878 else O_YNO(opt, "log-time-ascii", log_time_ascii)
879 else O_DEC(opt, "num-threads", num_threads)
880 else O_IFC(opt, "interface", num_ifs, ifs)
881 else O_IFC(opt, "outgoing-interface", num_out_ifs, out_ifs)
882 else O_YNO(opt, "interface-automatic", if_automatic)
883 else O_DEC(opt, "port", port)
884 else O_DEC(opt, "outgoing-range", outgoing_num_ports)
885 else O_DEC(opt, "outgoing-num-tcp", outgoing_num_tcp)
886 else O_DEC(opt, "incoming-num-tcp", incoming_num_tcp)
887 else O_MEM(opt, "stream-wait-size", stream_wait_size)
888 else O_DEC(opt, "edns-buffer-size", edns_buffer_size)
889 else O_DEC(opt, "msg-buffer-size", msg_buffer_size)
890 else O_MEM(opt, "msg-cache-size", msg_cache_size)
891 else O_DEC(opt, "msg-cache-slabs", msg_cache_slabs)
892 else O_DEC(opt, "num-queries-per-thread", num_queries_per_thread)
893 else O_UNS(opt, "jostle-timeout", jostle_time)
894 else O_MEM(opt, "so-rcvbuf", so_rcvbuf)
895 else O_MEM(opt, "so-sndbuf", so_sndbuf)
896 else O_YNO(opt, "so-reuseport", so_reuseport)
897 else O_YNO(opt, "ip-transparent", ip_transparent)
898 else O_YNO(opt, "ip-freebind", ip_freebind)
899 else O_MEM(opt, "rrset-cache-size", rrset_cache_size)
900 else O_DEC(opt, "rrset-cache-slabs", rrset_cache_slabs)
901 else O_YNO(opt, "prefetch-key", prefetch_key)
902 else O_YNO(opt, "prefetch", prefetch)
903 else O_YNO(opt, "deny-any", deny_any)
904 else O_DEC(opt, "cache-max-ttl", max_ttl)
905 else O_DEC(opt, "cache-max-negative-ttl", max_negative_ttl)
906 else O_DEC(opt, "cache-min-ttl", min_ttl)
907 else O_DEC(opt, "infra-host-ttl", host_ttl)
908 else O_DEC(opt, "infra-cache-slabs", infra_cache_slabs)
909 else O_DEC(opt, "infra-cache-min-rtt", infra_cache_min_rtt)
910 else O_MEM(opt, "infra-cache-numhosts", infra_cache_numhosts)
911 else O_UNS(opt, "delay-close", delay_close)
912 else O_YNO(opt, "do-ip4", do_ip4)
913 else O_YNO(opt, "do-ip6", do_ip6)
914 else O_YNO(opt, "do-udp", do_udp)
915 else O_YNO(opt, "do-tcp", do_tcp)
916 else O_YNO(opt, "tcp-upstream", tcp_upstream)
917 else O_YNO(opt, "udp-upstream-without-downstream", udp_upstream_without_downstream)
918 else O_DEC(opt, "tcp-mss", tcp_mss)
919 else O_DEC(opt, "outgoing-tcp-mss", outgoing_tcp_mss)
920 else O_DEC(opt, "tcp-idle-timeout", tcp_idle_timeout)
921 else O_YNO(opt, "edns-tcp-keepalive", do_tcp_keepalive)
922 else O_DEC(opt, "edns-tcp-keepalive-timeout", tcp_keepalive_timeout)
923 else O_YNO(opt, "ssl-upstream", ssl_upstream)
924 else O_STR(opt, "ssl-service-key", ssl_service_key)
925 else O_STR(opt, "ssl-service-pem", ssl_service_pem)
926 else O_DEC(opt, "ssl-port", ssl_port)
927 else O_STR(opt, "tls-cert-bundle", tls_cert_bundle)
928 else O_YNO(opt, "tls-win-cert", tls_win_cert)
929 else O_LST(opt, "tls-additional-port", tls_additional_port)
930 else O_LST(opt, "tls-session-ticket-keys", tls_session_ticket_keys.first)
931 else O_STR(opt, "tls-ciphers", tls_ciphers)
932 else O_STR(opt, "tls-ciphersuites", tls_ciphersuites)
933 else O_YNO(opt, "use-systemd", use_systemd)
934 else O_YNO(opt, "do-daemonize", do_daemonize)
935 else O_STR(opt, "chroot", chrootdir)
936 else O_STR(opt, "username", username)
937 else O_STR(opt, "directory", directory)
938 else O_STR(opt, "logfile", logfile)
939 else O_YNO(opt, "log-queries", log_queries)
940 else O_YNO(opt, "log-replies", log_replies)
941 else O_YNO(opt, "log-tag-queryreply", log_tag_queryreply)
942 else O_YNO(opt, "log-local-actions", log_local_actions)
943 else O_YNO(opt, "log-servfail", log_servfail)
944 else O_STR(opt, "pidfile", pidfile)
945 else O_YNO(opt, "hide-identity", hide_identity)
946 else O_YNO(opt, "hide-version", hide_version)
947 else O_YNO(opt, "hide-trustanchor", hide_trustanchor)
948 else O_STR(opt, "identity", identity)
949 else O_STR(opt, "version", version)
950 else O_STR(opt, "target-fetch-policy", target_fetch_policy)
951 else O_YNO(opt, "harden-short-bufsize", harden_short_bufsize)
952 else O_YNO(opt, "harden-large-queries", harden_large_queries)
953 else O_YNO(opt, "harden-glue", harden_glue)
954 else O_YNO(opt, "harden-dnssec-stripped", harden_dnssec_stripped)
955 else O_YNO(opt, "harden-below-nxdomain", harden_below_nxdomain)
956 else O_YNO(opt, "harden-referral-path", harden_referral_path)
957 else O_YNO(opt, "harden-algo-downgrade", harden_algo_downgrade)
958 else O_YNO(opt, "use-caps-for-id", use_caps_bits_for_id)
959 else O_LST(opt, "caps-whitelist", caps_whitelist)
960 else O_DEC(opt, "unwanted-reply-threshold", unwanted_threshold)
961 else O_YNO(opt, "do-not-query-localhost", donotquery_localhost)

1090#endif

1092 else O_STR(opt, "backend", cachedb_backend)
1093 else O_STR(opt, "secret-seed", cachedb_secret)
1094#endif
1095 /* not here:
1096 * outgoing-permit, outgoing-avoid - have list of ports
1097 * local-zone - zones and nodefault variables
1098 * local-data - see below
1099 * local-data-ptr - converted to local-data entries
1100 * stub-zone, name, stub-addr, stub-host, stub-prime
1101 * forward-zone, name, forward-addr, forward-host
1102 */
1103 else return 0;
1104 return 1;
1105}
1106
1107/** initialize the global cfg_parser object */
1108static void
1109create_cfg_parser(struct config_file* cfg, char* filename, const char* chroot)
1110{
1111 static struct config_parser_state st;
1112 cfg_parser = &st;
1113 cfg_parser->filename = filename;
1114 cfg_parser->line = 1;
1115 cfg_parser->errors = 0;
1116 cfg_parser->cfg = cfg;
1117 cfg_parser->chroot = chroot;
1118 init_cfg_parse();
1119}
1120
1121int
1122config_read(struct config_file* cfg, const char* filename, const char* chroot)
1123{
1124 FILE *in;
1125 char *fname = (char*)filename;
1126#ifdef HAVE_GLOB
1127 glob_t g;
1128 size_t i;
1129 int r, flags;
1130#endif
1131 if(!fname)
1132 return 1;
1133
1134 /* check for wildcards */
1135#ifdef HAVE_GLOB
1136 if(!(!strchr(fname, '*') && !strchr(fname, '?') && !strchr(fname, '[') &&
1137 !strchr(fname, '{') && !strchr(fname, '~'))) {
1138 verbose(VERB_QUERY, "wildcard found, processing %s", fname);
1139 flags = 0
1140#ifdef GLOB_ERR
1141 | GLOB_ERR
1142#endif
1143#ifdef GLOB_NOSORT
1144 | GLOB_NOSORT
1145#endif
1146#ifdef GLOB_BRACE
1147 | GLOB_BRACE
1148#endif
1149#ifdef GLOB_TILDE
1150 | GLOB_TILDE
1151#endif
1152 ;
1153 memset(&g, 0, sizeof(g));
1154 r = glob(fname, flags, NULL, &g);
1155 if(r) {
1156 /* some error */
1157 globfree(&g);
1158 if(r == GLOB_NOMATCH) {
1159 verbose(VERB_QUERY, "include: "
1160 "no matches for %s", fname);
1161 return 1;
1162 } else if(r == GLOB_NOSPACE) {
1163 log_err("include: %s: "
1164 "fnametern out of memory", fname);
1165 } else if(r == GLOB_ABORTED) {
1166 log_err("wildcard include: %s: expansion "
1167 "aborted (%s)", fname, strerror(errno));
1168 } else {
1169 log_err("wildcard include: %s: expansion "
1170 "failed (%s)", fname, strerror(errno));
1171 }
1172 /* ignore globs that yield no files */
1173 return 1;
1174 }
1175 /* process files found, if any */
1176 for(i=0; i<(size_t)g.gl_pathc; i++) {
1177 if(!config_read(cfg, g.gl_pathv[i], chroot)) {
1178 log_err("error reading wildcard "
1179 "include: %s", g.gl_pathv[i]);
1180 globfree(&g);
1181 return 0;
1182 }
1183 }
1184 globfree(&g);
1185 return 1;
1186 }
1187#endif /* HAVE_GLOB */
1188
1189 in = fopen(fname, "r");
1190 if(!in) {
1191 log_err("Could not open %s: %s", fname, strerror(errno));
1192 return 0;
1193 }
1194 create_cfg_parser(cfg, fname, chroot);
1195 ub_c_in = in;
1196 ub_c_parse();
1197 fclose(in);
1198
1199 if(!cfg->dnscrypt) cfg->dnscrypt_port = 0;
1200
1201 if(cfg_parser->errors != 0) {
1202 fprintf(stderr, "read %s failed: %d errors in configuration file\n",
1203 fname, cfg_parser->errors);
1204 errno=EINVAL;
1205 return 0;
1206 }
1207
1208 return 1;
1209}
1210
1211struct config_stub* cfg_stub_find(struct config_stub*** pp, const char* nm)
1212{
1213 struct config_stub* p = *(*pp);
1214 while(p) {
1215 if(strcmp(p->name, nm) == 0)
1216 return p;
1217 (*pp) = &p->next;
1218 p = p->next;
1219 }
1220 return NULL;
1221}
1222
1223void
1224config_delstrlist(struct config_strlist* p)
1225{
1226 struct config_strlist *np;
1227 while(p) {
1228 np = p->next;
1229 free(p->str);
1230 free(p);
1231 p = np;
1232 }
1233}

1236config_deldblstrlist(struct config_str2list* p)

1240 np = p->next;
1241 free(p->str);
1242 free(p->str2);
1243 free(p);
1244 p = np;
1245 }
1246}

1259 }
1260}

1327/** delete string array */
1328static void
1329config_del_strarray(char** array, int num)
1330{
1331 int i;
1332 if(!array)
1333 return;
1334 for(i=0; i<num; i++) {
1335 free(array[i]);
1336 }
1337 free(array);
1338}

1341config_del_strbytelist(struct config_strbytelist* p)

1344 while(p) {
1345 np = p->next;
1346 free(p->str);
1347 free(p->str2);
1348 free(p);
1349 p = np;
1350 }
1351}

1353void
1354config_delete(struct config_file* cfg)
1355{
1356 if(!cfg) return;
1357 free(cfg->username);
1358 free(cfg->chrootdir);
1359 free(cfg->directory);
1360 free(cfg->logfile);
1361 free(cfg->pidfile);
1362 free(cfg->target_fetch_policy);
1363 free(cfg->ssl_service_key);
1364 free(cfg->ssl_service_pem);
1365 free(cfg->tls_cert_bundle);
1366 config_delstrlist(cfg->tls_additional_port);
1367 config_delstrlist(cfg->tls_session_ticket_keys.first);
1368 free(cfg->tls_ciphers);
1369 free(cfg->tls_ciphersuites);
1370 free(cfg->log_identity);
1371 config_del_strarray(cfg->ifs, cfg->num_ifs);
1372 config_del_strarray(cfg->out_ifs, cfg->num_out_ifs);
1373 config_delstubs(cfg->stubs);
1374 config_delstubs(cfg->forwards);
1375 config_delauths(cfg->auths);
1376 config_delviews(cfg->views);
1377 config_delstrlist(cfg->donotqueryaddrs);
1378 config_delstrlist(cfg->root_hints);
1379#ifdef CLIENT_SUBNET
1380 config_delstrlist(cfg->client_subnet);
1381 config_delstrlist(cfg->client_subnet_zone);
1382#endif
1383 free(cfg->identity);
1384 free(cfg->version);
1385 free(cfg->module_conf);
1386 free(cfg->outgoing_avail_ports);
1387 free(cfg->python_script);
1388 config_delstrlist(cfg->caps_whitelist);
1389 config_delstrlist(cfg->private_address);
1390 config_delstrlist(cfg->private_domain);
1391 config_delstrlist(cfg->auto_trust_anchor_file_list);
1392 config_delstrlist(cfg->trust_anchor_file_list);
1393 config_delstrlist(cfg->trusted_keys_file_list);
1394 config_delstrlist(cfg->trust_anchor_list);
1395 config_delstrlist(cfg->domain_insecure);
1396 free(cfg->dlv_anchor_file);
1397 config_delstrlist(cfg->dlv_anchor_list);
1398 config_deldblstrlist(cfg->acls);
1399 config_deldblstrlist(cfg->tcp_connection_limits);
1400 free(cfg->val_nsec3_key_iterations);
1401 config_deldblstrlist(cfg->local_zones);
1402 config_delstrlist(cfg->local_zones_nodefault);
1403 config_delstrlist(cfg->local_data);
1404 config_deltrplstrlist(cfg->local_zone_overrides);
1405 config_del_strarray(cfg->tagname, cfg->num_tags);
1406 config_del_strbytelist(cfg->local_zone_tags);
1407 config_del_strbytelist(cfg->acl_tags);
1408 config_del_strbytelist(cfg->respip_tags);
1409 config_deltrplstrlist(cfg->acl_tag_actions);
1410 config_deltrplstrlist(cfg->acl_tag_datas);
1411 config_delstrlist(cfg->control_ifs.first);
1412 free(cfg->server_key_file);
1413 free(cfg->server_cert_file);
1414 free(cfg->control_key_file);
1415 free(cfg->control_cert_file);
1416 free(cfg->dns64_prefix);
1417 config_delstrlist(cfg->dns64_ignore_aaaa);
1418 free(cfg->dnstap_socket_path);
1419 free(cfg->dnstap_identity);
1420 free(cfg->dnstap_version);
1421 config_deldblstrlist(cfg->ratelimit_for_domain);
1422 config_deldblstrlist(cfg->ratelimit_below_domain);
1423#ifdef USE_IPSECMOD
1424 free(cfg->ipsecmod_hook);
1425 config_delstrlist(cfg->ipsecmod_whitelist);
1426#endif
1427#ifdef USE_CACHEDB
1428 free(cfg->cachedb_backend);
1429 free(cfg->cachedb_secret);
1430#endif
1431 free(cfg);
1432}
1433
1434static void
1435init_outgoing_availports(int* a, int num)
1436{
1437 /* generated with make iana_update */
1438 const int iana_assigned[] = {
1439#include "util/iana_ports.inc"
1440 -1 }; /* end marker to put behind trailing comma */
1441
1442 int i;
1443 /* do not use <1024, that could be trouble with the system, privs */
1444 for(i=1024; i<num; i++) {
1445 a[i] = i;
1446 }
1447 /* create empty spot at 49152 to keep ephemeral ports available
1448 * to other programs */
1449 for(i=49152; i<49152+256; i++)
1450 a[i] = 0;
1451 /* pick out all the IANA assigned ports */
1452 for(i=0; iana_assigned[i]!=-1; i++) {
1453 if(iana_assigned[i] < num)
1454 a[iana_assigned[i]] = 0;
1455 }
1456}
1457
1458int
1459cfg_mark_ports(const char* str, int allow, int* avail, int num)
1460{
1461 char* mid = strchr(str, '-');
1462 if(!mid) {
1463 int port = atoi(str);
1464 if(port == 0 && strcmp(str, "0") != 0) {
1465 log_err("cannot parse port number '%s'", str);
1466 return 0;
1467 }
1468 if(port < num)
1469 avail[port] = (allow?port:0);
1470 } else {
1471 int i, low, high = atoi(mid+1);
1472 char buf[16];
1473 if(high == 0 && strcmp(mid+1, "0") != 0) {
1474 log_err("cannot parse port number '%s'", mid+1);
1475 return 0;
1476 }
1477 if( (int)(mid-str)+1 >= (int)sizeof(buf) ) {
1478 log_err("cannot parse port number '%s'", str);
1479 return 0;
1480 }
1481 if(mid > str)
1482 memcpy(buf, str, (size_t)(mid-str));
1483 buf[mid-str] = 0;
1484 low = atoi(buf);
1485 if(low == 0 && strcmp(buf, "0") != 0) {
1486 log_err("cannot parse port number '%s'", buf);
1487 return 0;
1488 }
1489 for(i=low; i<=high; i++) {
1490 if(i < num)
1491 avail[i] = (allow?i:0);
1492 }
1493 return 1;
1494 }
1495 return 1;
1496}
1497
1498int
1499cfg_scan_ports(int* avail, int num)
1500{
1501 int i;
1502 int count = 0;
1503 for(i=0; i<num; i++) {
1504 if(avail[i])
1505 count++;
1506 }
1507 return count;
1508}
1509
1510int cfg_condense_ports(struct config_file* cfg, int** avail)
1511{
1512 int num = cfg_scan_ports(cfg->outgoing_avail_ports, 65536);
1513 int i, at = 0;
1514 *avail = NULL;
1515 if(num == 0)
1516 return 0;
1517 *avail = (int*)reallocarray(NULL, (size_t)num, sizeof(int));
1518 if(!*avail)
1519 return 0;
1520 for(i=0; i<65536; i++) {
1521 if(cfg->outgoing_avail_ports[i])
1522 (*avail)[at++] = cfg->outgoing_avail_ports[i];
1523 }
1524 log_assert(at == num);
1525 return num;
1526}
1527
1528/** print error with file and line number */
1529static void ub_c_error_va_list(const char *fmt, va_list args)
1530{
1531 cfg_parser->errors++;
1532 fprintf(stderr, "%s:%d: error: ", cfg_parser->filename,
1533 cfg_parser->line);
1534 vfprintf(stderr, fmt, args);
1535 fprintf(stderr, "\n");
1536}
1537
1538/** print error with file and line number */
1539void ub_c_error_msg(const char* fmt, ...)
1540{
1541 va_list args;
1542 va_start(args, fmt);
1543 ub_c_error_va_list(fmt, args);
1544 va_end(args);
1545}
1546
1547void ub_c_error(const char *str)
1548{
1549 cfg_parser->errors++;
1550 fprintf(stderr, "%s:%d: error: %s\n", cfg_parser->filename,
1551 cfg_parser->line, str);
1552}
1553
1554int ub_c_wrap(void)
1555{
1556 return 1;
1557}
1558
1559int cfg_strlist_append(struct config_strlist_head* list, char* item)
1560{
1561 struct config_strlist *s;
1562 if(!item || !list) {
1563 free(item);
1564 return 0;
1565 }
1566 s = (struct config_strlist*)calloc(1, sizeof(struct config_strlist));
1567 if(!s) {
1568 free(item);
1569 return 0;
1570 }
1571 s->str = item;
1572 s->next = NULL;
1573 if(list->last)
1574 list->last->next = s;
1575 else
1576 list->first = s;
1577 list->last = s;
1578 return 1;
1579}
1580
1581int
1582cfg_region_strlist_insert(struct regional* region,
1583 struct config_strlist** head, char* item)
1584{
1585 struct config_strlist *s;
1586 if(!item || !head)
1587 return 0;
1588 s = (struct config_strlist*)regional_alloc_zero(region,
1589 sizeof(struct config_strlist));
1590 if(!s)
1591 return 0;
1592 s->str = item;
1593 s->next = *head;
1594 *head = s;
1595 return 1;
1596}
1597
1598struct config_strlist*
1599cfg_strlist_find(struct config_strlist* head, const char *item)
1600{
1601 struct config_strlist *s = head;
1602 if(!head){
1603 return NULL;
1604 }
1605 while(s) {
1606 if(strcmp(s->str, item) == 0) {
1607 return s;
1608 }
1609 s = s->next;
1610 }
1611 return NULL;
1612}

1624 free(item);
1625 return 0;
1626 }

1628 s->next = *head;
1629 *head = s;
1630 return 1;
1631}

1690
1691time_t
1692cfg_convert_timeval(const char* str)
1693{
1694 time_t t;
1695 struct tm tm;
1696 memset(&tm, 0, sizeof(tm));
1697 if(strlen(str) < 14)
1698 return 0;
1699 if(sscanf(str, "%4d%2d%2d%2d%2d%2d", &tm.tm_year, &tm.tm_mon,
1700 &tm.tm_mday, &tm.tm_hour, &tm.tm_min, &tm.tm_sec) != 6)
1701 return 0;
1702 tm.tm_year -= 1900;
1703 tm.tm_mon--;
1704 /* Check values */
1705 if (tm.tm_year < 70) return 0;
1706 if (tm.tm_mon < 0 || tm.tm_mon > 11) return 0;
1707 if (tm.tm_mday < 1 || tm.tm_mday > 31) return 0;
1708 if (tm.tm_hour < 0 || tm.tm_hour > 23) return 0;
1709 if (tm.tm_min < 0 || tm.tm_min > 59) return 0;
1710 if (tm.tm_sec < 0 || tm.tm_sec > 59) return 0;
1711 /* call ldns conversion function */
1712 t = sldns_mktime_from_utc(&tm);
1713 return t;
1714}
1715
1716int
1717cfg_count_numbers(const char* s)
1718{
1719 /* format ::= (sp num)+ sp */
1720 /* num ::= [-](0-9)+ */
1721 /* sp ::= (space|tab)* */
1722 int num = 0;
1723 while(*s) {
1724 while(*s && isspace((unsigned char)*s))
1725 s++;
1726 if(!*s) /* end of string */
1727 break;
1728 if(*s == '-')
1729 s++;
1730 if(!*s) /* only - not allowed */
1731 return 0;
1732 if(!isdigit((unsigned char)*s)) /* bad character */
1733 return 0;
1734 while(*s && isdigit((unsigned char)*s))
1735 s++;
1736 num++;
1737 }
1738 return num;
1739}
1740
1741/** all digit number */
1742static int isalldigit(const char* str, size_t l)
1743{
1744 size_t i;
1745 for(i=0; i<l; i++)
1746 if(!isdigit((unsigned char)str[i]))
1747 return 0;
1748 return 1;
1749}
1750
1751int
1752cfg_parse_memsize(const char* str, size_t* res)
1753{
1754 size_t len;
1755 size_t mult = 1;
1756 if(!str || (len=(size_t)strlen(str)) == 0) {
1757 log_err("not a size: '%s'", str);
1758 return 0;
1759 }
1760 if(isalldigit(str, len)) {
1761 *res = (size_t)atol(str);
1762 return 1;
1763 }
1764 /* check appended num */
1765 while(len>0 && str[len-1]==' ')
1766 len--;
1767 if(len > 1 && str[len-1] == 'b')
1768 len--;
1769 else if(len > 1 && str[len-1] == 'B')
1770 len--;
1771
1772 if(len > 1 && tolower((unsigned char)str[len-1]) == 'g')
1773 mult = 1024*1024*1024;
1774 else if(len > 1 && tolower((unsigned char)str[len-1]) == 'm')
1775 mult = 1024*1024;
1776 else if(len > 1 && tolower((unsigned char)str[len-1]) == 'k')
1777 mult = 1024;
1778 else if(len > 0 && isdigit((unsigned char)str[len-1]))
1779 mult = 1;
1780 else {
1781 log_err("unknown size specifier: '%s'", str);
1782 return 0;
1783 }
1784 while(len>1 && str[len-2]==' ')
1785 len--;
1786
1787 if(!isalldigit(str, len-1)) {
1788 log_err("unknown size specifier: '%s'", str);
1789 return 0;
1790 }
1791 *res = ((size_t)atol(str)) * mult;
1792 return 1;
1793}
1794
1795int
1796find_tag_id(struct config_file* cfg, const char* tag)
1797{
1798 int i;
1799 for(i=0; i<cfg->num_tags; i++) {
1800 if(strcmp(cfg->tagname[i], tag) == 0)
1801 return i;
1802 }
1803 return -1;
1804}
1805
1806int
1807config_add_tag(struct config_file* cfg, const char* tag)
1808{
1809 char** newarray;
1810 char* newtag;
1811 if(find_tag_id(cfg, tag) != -1)
1812 return 1; /* nothing to do */
1813 newarray = (char**)malloc(sizeof(char*)*(cfg->num_tags+1));
1814 if(!newarray)
1815 return 0;
1816 newtag = strdup(tag);
1817 if(!newtag) {
1818 free(newarray);
1819 return 0;
1820 }
1821 if(cfg->tagname) {
1822 memcpy(newarray, cfg->tagname, sizeof(char*)*cfg->num_tags);
1823 free(cfg->tagname);
1824 }
1825 newarray[cfg->num_tags++] = newtag;
1826 cfg->tagname = newarray;
1827 return 1;
1828}
1829
1830/** set a bit in a bit array */
1831static void
1832cfg_set_bit(uint8_t* bitlist, size_t len, int id)
1833{
1834 int pos = id/8;
1835 log_assert((size_t)pos < len);
1836 (void)len;
1837 bitlist[pos] |= 1<<(id%8);
1838}
1839
1840uint8_t* config_parse_taglist(struct config_file* cfg, char* str,
1841 size_t* listlen)
1842{
1843 uint8_t* taglist = NULL;
1844 size_t len = 0;
1845 char* p, *s;
1846
1847 /* allocate */
1848 if(cfg->num_tags == 0) {
1849 log_err("parse taglist, but no tags defined");
1850 return 0;
1851 }
1852 len = (size_t)(cfg->num_tags+7)/8;
1853 taglist = calloc(1, len);
1854 if(!taglist) {
1855 log_err("out of memory");
1856 return 0;
1857 }
1858
1859 /* parse */
1860 s = str;
1861 while((p=strsep(&s, " \t\n")) != NULL) {
1862 if(*p) {
1863 int id = find_tag_id(cfg, p);
1864 /* set this bit in the bitlist */
1865 if(id == -1) {
1866 log_err("unknown tag: %s", p);
1867 free(taglist);
1868 return 0;
1869 }
1870 cfg_set_bit(taglist, len, id);
1871 }
1872 }
1873
1874 *listlen = len;
1875 return taglist;
1876}
1877
1878char* config_taglist2str(struct config_file* cfg, uint8_t* taglist,
1879 size_t taglen)
1880{
1881 char buf[10240];
1882 size_t i, j, len = 0;
1883 buf[0] = 0;
1884 for(i=0; i<taglen; i++) {
1885 if(taglist[i] == 0)
1886 continue;
1887 for(j=0; j<8; j++) {
1888 if((taglist[i] & (1<<j)) != 0) {
1889 size_t id = i*8 + j;
1890 snprintf(buf+len, sizeof(buf)-len, "%s%s",
1891 (len==0?"":" "), cfg->tagname[id]);
1892 len += strlen(buf+len);
1893 }
1894 }
1895 }
1896 return strdup(buf);
1897}
1898
1899int taglist_intersect(uint8_t* list1, size_t list1len, uint8_t* list2,
1900 size_t list2len)
1901{
1902 size_t i;
1903 if(!list1 || !list2)
1904 return 0;
1905 for(i=0; i<list1len && i<list2len; i++) {
1906 if((list1[i] & list2[i]) != 0)
1907 return 1;
1908 }
1909 return 0;
1910}
1911
1912void
1913config_apply(struct config_file* config)
1914{
1915 MAX_TTL = (time_t)config->max_ttl;
1916 MIN_TTL = (time_t)config->min_ttl;
1917 SERVE_EXPIRED_TTL = (time_t)config->serve_expired_ttl;
1918 MAX_NEG_TTL = (time_t)config->max_negative_ttl;
1919 RTT_MIN_TIMEOUT = config->infra_cache_min_rtt;
1920 EDNS_ADVERTISED_SIZE = (uint16_t)config->edns_buffer_size;
1921 MINIMAL_RESPONSES = config->minimal_responses;
1922 RRSET_ROUNDROBIN = config->rrset_roundrobin;
1923 LOG_TAG_QUERYREPLY = config->log_tag_queryreply;
1924 UNKNOWN_SERVER_NICENESS = config->unknown_server_time_limit;
1925 log_set_time_asc(config->log_time_ascii);
1926 autr_permit_small_holddown = config->permit_small_holddown;
1927 stream_wait_max = config->stream_wait_size;
1928}
1929
1930void config_lookup_uid(struct config_file* cfg)
1931{
1932#ifdef HAVE_GETPWNAM
1933 /* translate username into uid and gid */
1934 if(cfg->username && cfg->username[0]) {
1935 struct passwd *pwd;
1936 if((pwd = getpwnam(cfg->username)) != NULL) {
1937 cfg_uid = pwd->pw_uid;
1938 cfg_gid = pwd->pw_gid;
1939 }
1940 }
1941#else
1942 (void)cfg;
1943#endif
1944}
1945
1946/**
1947 * Calculate string length of full pathname in original filesys
1948 * @param fname: the path name to convert.
1949 * Must not be null or empty.
1950 * @param cfg: config struct for chroot and chdir (if set).
1951 * @param use_chdir: if false, only chroot is applied.
1952 * @return length of string.
1953 * remember to allocate one more for 0 at end in mallocs.
1954 */
1955static size_t
1956strlen_after_chroot(const char* fname, struct config_file* cfg, int use_chdir)
1957{
1958 size_t len = 0;
1959 int slashit = 0;
1960 if(cfg->chrootdir && cfg->chrootdir[0] &&
1961 strncmp(cfg->chrootdir, fname, strlen(cfg->chrootdir)) == 0) {
1962 /* already full pathname, return it */
1963 return strlen(fname);
1964 }
1965 /* chroot */
1966 if(cfg->chrootdir && cfg->chrootdir[0]) {
1967 /* start with chrootdir */
1968 len += strlen(cfg->chrootdir);
1969 slashit = 1;
1970 }
1971 /* chdir */
1972#ifdef UB_ON_WINDOWS
1973 if(fname[0] != 0 && fname[1] == ':') {
1974 /* full path, no chdir */
1975 } else
1976#endif
1977 if(fname[0] == '/' || !use_chdir) {
1978 /* full path, no chdir */
1979 } else if(cfg->directory && cfg->directory[0]) {
1980 /* prepend chdir */
1981 if(slashit && cfg->directory[0] != '/')
1982 len++;
1983 if(cfg->chrootdir && cfg->chrootdir[0] &&
1984 strncmp(cfg->chrootdir, cfg->directory,
1985 strlen(cfg->chrootdir)) == 0)
1986 len += strlen(cfg->directory)-strlen(cfg->chrootdir);
1987 else len += strlen(cfg->directory);
1988 slashit = 1;
1989 }
1990 /* fname */
1991 if(slashit && fname[0] != '/')
1992 len++;
1993 len += strlen(fname);
1994 return len;
1995}
1996
1997char*
1998fname_after_chroot(const char* fname, struct config_file* cfg, int use_chdir)
1999{
2000 size_t len = strlen_after_chroot(fname, cfg, use_chdir)+1;
2001 int slashit = 0;
2002 char* buf = (char*)malloc(len);
2003 if(!buf)
2004 return NULL;
2005 buf[0] = 0;
2006 /* is fname already in chroot ? */
2007 if(cfg->chrootdir && cfg->chrootdir[0] &&
2008 strncmp(cfg->chrootdir, fname, strlen(cfg->chrootdir)) == 0) {
2009 /* already full pathname, return it */
2010 (void)strlcpy(buf, fname, len);
2011 buf[len-1] = 0;
2012 return buf;
2013 }
2014 /* chroot */
2015 if(cfg->chrootdir && cfg->chrootdir[0]) {
2016 /* start with chrootdir */
2017 (void)strlcpy(buf, cfg->chrootdir, len);
2018 slashit = 1;
2019 }
2020#ifdef UB_ON_WINDOWS
2021 if(fname[0] != 0 && fname[1] == ':') {
2022 /* full path, no chdir */
2023 } else
2024#endif
2025 /* chdir */
2026 if(fname[0] == '/' || !use_chdir) {
2027 /* full path, no chdir */
2028 } else if(cfg->directory && cfg->directory[0]) {
2029 /* prepend chdir */
2030 if(slashit && cfg->directory[0] != '/')
2031 (void)strlcat(buf, "/", len);
2032 /* is the directory already in the chroot? */
2033 if(cfg->chrootdir && cfg->chrootdir[0] &&
2034 strncmp(cfg->chrootdir, cfg->directory,
2035 strlen(cfg->chrootdir)) == 0)
2036 (void)strlcat(buf, cfg->directory+strlen(cfg->chrootdir),
2037 len);
2038 else (void)strlcat(buf, cfg->directory, len);
2039 slashit = 1;
2040 }
2041 /* fname */
2042 if(slashit && fname[0] != '/')
2043 (void)strlcat(buf, "/", len);
2044 (void)strlcat(buf, fname, len);
2045 buf[len-1] = 0;
2046 return buf;
2047}
2048
2049/** return next space character in string */
2050static char* next_space_pos(const char* str)
2051{
2052 char* sp = strchr(str, ' ');
2053 char* tab = strchr(str, '\t');
2054 if(!tab && !sp)
2055 return NULL;
2056 if(!sp) return tab;
2057 if(!tab) return sp;
2058 return (sp<tab)?sp:tab;
2059}
2060
2061/** return last space character in string */
2062static char* last_space_pos(const char* str)
2063{
2064 char* sp = strrchr(str, ' ');
2065 char* tab = strrchr(str, '\t');
2066 if(!tab && !sp)
2067 return NULL;
2068 if(!sp) return tab;
2069 if(!tab) return sp;
2070 return (sp>tab)?sp:tab;
2071}
2072
2073int
2074cfg_parse_local_zone(struct config_file* cfg, const char* val)
2075{
2076 const char *type, *name_end, *name;
2077 char buf[256];
2078
2079 /* parse it as: [zone_name] [between stuff] [zone_type] */
2080 name = val;
2081 while(*name && isspace((unsigned char)*name))
2082 name++;
2083 if(!*name) {
2084 log_err("syntax error: too short: %s", val);
2085 return 0;
2086 }
2087 name_end = next_space_pos(name);
2088 if(!name_end || !*name_end) {
2089 log_err("syntax error: expected zone type: %s", val);
2090 return 0;
2091 }
2092 if (name_end - name > 255) {
2093 log_err("syntax error: bad zone name: %s", val);
2094 return 0;
2095 }
2096 (void)strlcpy(buf, name, sizeof(buf));
2097 buf[name_end-name] = '\0';
2098
2099 type = last_space_pos(name_end);
2100 while(type && *type && isspace((unsigned char)*type))
2101 type++;
2102 if(!type || !*type) {
2103 log_err("syntax error: expected zone type: %s", val);
2104 return 0;
2105 }
2106
2107 if(strcmp(type, "nodefault")==0) {
2108 return cfg_strlist_insert(&cfg->local_zones_nodefault,
2109 strdup(name));
2110 } else {
2111 return cfg_str2list_insert(&cfg->local_zones, strdup(buf),
2112 strdup(type));
2113 }
2114}
2115
2116char* cfg_ptr_reverse(char* str)
2117{
2118 char* ip, *ip_end;
2119 char* name;
2120 char* result;
2121 char buf[1024];
2122 struct sockaddr_storage addr;
2123 socklen_t addrlen;
2124
2125 /* parse it as: [IP] [between stuff] [name] */
2126 ip = str;
2127 while(*ip && isspace((unsigned char)*ip))
2128 ip++;
2129 if(!*ip) {
2130 log_err("syntax error: too short: %s", str);
2131 return NULL;
2132 }
2133 ip_end = next_space_pos(ip);
2134 if(!ip_end || !*ip_end) {
2135 log_err("syntax error: expected name: %s", str);
2136 return NULL;
2137 }
2138
2139 name = last_space_pos(ip_end);
2140 if(!name || !*name) {
2141 log_err("syntax error: expected name: %s", str);
2142 return NULL;
2143 }
2144
2145 sscanf(ip, "%100s", buf);
2146 buf[sizeof(buf)-1]=0;
2147
2148 if(!ipstrtoaddr(buf, UNBOUND_DNS_PORT, &addr, &addrlen)) {
2149 log_err("syntax error: cannot parse address: %s", str);
2150 return NULL;
2151 }
2152
2153 /* reverse IPv4:
2154 * ddd.ddd.ddd.ddd.in-addr-arpa.
2155 * IPv6: (h.){32}.ip6.arpa. */
2156
2157 if(addr_is_ip6(&addr, addrlen)) {
2158 uint8_t ad[16];
2159 const char* hex = "0123456789abcdef";
2160 char *p = buf;
2161 int i;
2162 memmove(ad, &((struct sockaddr_in6*)&addr)->sin6_addr,
2163 sizeof(ad));
2164 for(i=15; i>=0; i--) {
2165 uint8_t b = ad[i];
2166 *p++ = hex[ (b&0x0f) ];
2167 *p++ = '.';
2168 *p++ = hex[ (b&0xf0) >> 4 ];
2169 *p++ = '.';
2170 }
2171 snprintf(buf+16*4, sizeof(buf)-16*4, "ip6.arpa. ");
2172 } else {
2173 uint8_t ad[4];
2174 memmove(ad, &((struct sockaddr_in*)&addr)->sin_addr,
2175 sizeof(ad));
2176 snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "%u.%u.%u.%u.in-addr.arpa. ",
2177 (unsigned)ad[3], (unsigned)ad[2],
2178 (unsigned)ad[1], (unsigned)ad[0]);
2179 }
2180
2181 /* printed the reverse address, now the between goop and name on end */
2182 while(*ip_end && isspace((unsigned char)*ip_end))
2183 ip_end++;
2184 if(name>ip_end) {
2185 snprintf(buf+strlen(buf), sizeof(buf)-strlen(buf), "%.*s",
2186 (int)(name-ip_end), ip_end);
2187 }
2188 snprintf(buf+strlen(buf), sizeof(buf)-strlen(buf), " PTR %s", name);
2189
2190 result = strdup(buf);
2191 if(!result) {
2192 log_err("out of memory parsing %s", str);
2193 return NULL;
2194 }
2195 return result;
2196}
2197
2198#ifdef UB_ON_WINDOWS
2199char*
2200w_lookup_reg_str(const char* key, const char* name)
2201{
2202 HKEY hk = NULL;
2203 DWORD type = 0;
2204 BYTE buf[1024];
2205 DWORD len = (DWORD)sizeof(buf);
2206 LONG ret;
2207 char* result = NULL;
2208 ret = RegOpenKeyEx(HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, key, 0, KEY_READ, &hk);
2209 if(ret == ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND)
2210 return NULL; /* key does not exist */
2211 else if(ret != ERROR_SUCCESS) {
2212 log_err("RegOpenKeyEx failed");
2213 return NULL;
2214 }
2215 ret = RegQueryValueEx(hk, (LPCTSTR)name, 0, &type, buf, &len);
2216 if(RegCloseKey(hk))
2217 log_err("RegCloseKey");
2218 if(ret == ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND)
2219 return NULL; /* name does not exist */
2220 else if(ret != ERROR_SUCCESS) {
2221 log_err("RegQueryValueEx failed");
2222 return NULL;
2223 }
2224 if(type == REG_SZ || type == REG_MULTI_SZ || type == REG_EXPAND_SZ) {
2225 buf[sizeof(buf)-1] = 0;
2226 buf[sizeof(buf)-2] = 0; /* for multi_sz */
2227 result = strdup((char*)buf);
2228 if(!result) log_err("out of memory");
2229 }
2230 return result;
2231}
2232
2233void w_config_adjust_directory(struct config_file* cfg)
2234{
2235 if(cfg->directory && cfg->directory[0]) {
2236 TCHAR dirbuf[2*MAX_PATH+4];
2237 if(strcmp(cfg->directory, "%EXECUTABLE%") == 0) {
2238 /* get executable path, and if that contains
2239 * directories, snip off the filename part */
2240 dirbuf[0] = 0;
2241 if(!GetModuleFileName(NULL, dirbuf, MAX_PATH))
2242 log_err("could not GetModuleFileName");
2243 if(strrchr(dirbuf, '\\')) {
2244 (strrchr(dirbuf, '\\'))[0] = 0;
2245 } else log_err("GetModuleFileName had no path");
2246 if(dirbuf[0]) {
2247 /* adjust directory for later lookups to work*/
2248 free(cfg->directory);
2249 cfg->directory = memdup(dirbuf, strlen(dirbuf)+1);
2250 }
2251 }
2252 }
2253}
2254#endif /* UB_ON_WINDOWS */
2255
2256void errinf(struct module_qstate* qstate, const char* str)
2257{
2258 struct config_strlist* p;
2259 if((qstate->env->cfg->val_log_level < 2 && !qstate->env->cfg->log_servfail) || !str)
2260 return;
2261 p = (struct config_strlist*)regional_alloc(qstate->region, sizeof(*p));
2262 if(!p) {
2263 log_err("malloc failure in validator-error-info string");
2264 return;
2265 }
2266 p->next = NULL;
2267 p->str = regional_strdup(qstate->region, str);
2268 if(!p->str) {
2269 log_err("malloc failure in validator-error-info string");
2270 return;
2271 }
2272 /* add at end */
2273 if(qstate->errinf) {
2274 struct config_strlist* q = qstate->errinf;
2275 while(q->next)
2276 q = q->next;
2277 q->next = p;
2278 } else qstate->errinf = p;
2279}
2280
2281void errinf_origin(struct module_qstate* qstate, struct sock_list *origin)
2282{
2283 struct sock_list* p;
2284 if(qstate->env->cfg->val_log_level < 2 && !qstate->env->cfg->log_servfail)
2285 return;
2286 for(p=origin; p; p=p->next) {
2287 char buf[256];
2288 if(p == origin)
2289 snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "from ");
2290 else snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "and ");
2291 if(p->len == 0)
2292 snprintf(buf+strlen(buf), sizeof(buf)-strlen(buf),
2293 "cache");
2294 else
2295 addr_to_str(&p->addr, p->len, buf+strlen(buf),
2296 sizeof(buf)-strlen(buf));
2297 errinf(qstate, buf);
2298 }
2299}
2300
2301char* errinf_to_str_bogus(struct module_qstate* qstate)
2302{
2303 char buf[20480];
2304 char* p = buf;
2305 size_t left = sizeof(buf);
2306 struct config_strlist* s;
2307 char dname[LDNS_MAX_DOMAINLEN+1];
2308 char t[16], c[16];
2309 sldns_wire2str_type_buf(qstate->qinfo.qtype, t, sizeof(t));
2310 sldns_wire2str_class_buf(qstate->qinfo.qclass, c, sizeof(c));
2311 dname_str(qstate->qinfo.qname, dname);
2312 snprintf(p, left, "validation failure <%s %s %s>:", dname, t, c);
2313 left -= strlen(p); p += strlen(p);
2314 if(!qstate->errinf)
2315 snprintf(p, left, " misc failure");
2316 else for(s=qstate->errinf; s; s=s->next) {
2317 snprintf(p, left, " %s", s->str);
2318 left -= strlen(p); p += strlen(p);
2319 }
2320 p = strdup(buf);
2321 if(!p)
2322 log_err("malloc failure in errinf_to_str");
2323 return p;
2324}
2325
2326char* errinf_to_str_servfail(struct module_qstate* qstate)
2327{
2328 char buf[20480];
2329 char* p = buf;
2330 size_t left = sizeof(buf);
2331 struct config_strlist* s;
2332 char dname[LDNS_MAX_DOMAINLEN+1];
2333 char t[16], c[16];
2334 sldns_wire2str_type_buf(qstate->qinfo.qtype, t, sizeof(t));
2335 sldns_wire2str_class_buf(qstate->qinfo.qclass, c, sizeof(c));
2336 dname_str(qstate->qinfo.qname, dname);
2337 snprintf(p, left, "SERVFAIL <%s %s %s>:", dname, t, c);
2338 left -= strlen(p); p += strlen(p);
2339 if(!qstate->errinf)
2340 snprintf(p, left, " misc failure");
2341 else for(s=qstate->errinf; s; s=s->next) {
2342 snprintf(p, left, " %s", s->str);
2343 left -= strlen(p); p += strlen(p);
2344 }
2345 p = strdup(buf);
2346 if(!p)
2347 log_err("malloc failure in errinf_to_str");
2348 return p;
2349}
2350
2351void errinf_rrset(struct module_qstate* qstate, struct ub_packed_rrset_key *rr)
2352{
2353 char buf[1024];
2354 char dname[LDNS_MAX_DOMAINLEN+1];
2355 char t[16], c[16];
2356 if((qstate->env->cfg->val_log_level < 2 && !qstate->env->cfg->log_servfail) || !rr)
2357 return;
2358 sldns_wire2str_type_buf(ntohs(rr->rk.type), t, sizeof(t));
2359 sldns_wire2str_class_buf(ntohs(rr->rk.rrset_class), c, sizeof(c));
2360 dname_str(rr->rk.dname, dname);
2361 snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "for <%s %s %s>", dname, t, c);
2362 errinf(qstate, buf);
2363}
2364
2365void errinf_dname(struct module_qstate* qstate, const char* str, uint8_t* dname)
2366{
2367 char b[1024];
2368 char buf[LDNS_MAX_DOMAINLEN+1];
2369 if((qstate->env->cfg->val_log_level < 2 && !qstate->env->cfg->log_servfail) || !str || !dname)
2370 return;
2371 dname_str(dname, buf);
2372 snprintf(b, sizeof(b), "%s %s", str, buf);
2373 errinf(qstate, b);
2374}
2375
2376int options_remote_is_address(struct config_file* cfg)
2377{
2378 if(!cfg->remote_control_enable) return 0;
2379 if(!cfg->control_ifs.first) return 1;
2380 if(!cfg->control_ifs.first->str) return 1;
2381 if(cfg->control_ifs.first->str[0] == 0) return 1;
2382 return (cfg->control_ifs.first->str[0] != '/');
2383}
